File Structure for an On-Line Catalog of One Million Titles .A Dimsdale, J. J. A description is given of the file organization and design of an on-line catalog suitable for automation of a library of one million books.. A method of virtual hash addressing allows rapid search of the indexes to the catalog file.. Storage of textual material in a compressed form allows considerable reduction in storage costs.. .X 19	1	875 44	1	875 57	1	875 62	1	875 124	1	875 125	1	875 141	2	875 165	1	875 228	1	875 244	1	875 299	3	875 310	1	875 318	3	875 321	1	875 324	1	875 329	3	875 333	2	875 363	1	875 365	1	875 381	1	875 409	1	875 416	2	875 442	2	875 448	1	875 450	3	875 452	1	875 462	1	875 484	1	875 495	2	875 511	4	875 516	1	875 518	1	875 521	2	875 522	2	875 523	1	875 524	1	875 526	1	875 527	1	875 528	1	875 529	2	875 530	1	875 563	1	875 565	2	875 567	2	875 575	1	875 604	1	875 610	1	875 615	1	875 620	1	875 625	1	875 626	1	875 627	2	875 628	2	875 630	1	875 636	1	875 700	1	875 705	1	875 707	1	875 727	1	875 737	1	875 754	1	875 791	1	875 812	1	875 817	1	875 822	1	875 824	1	875 835	1	875 851	1	875 853	1	875 854	1	875 862	1	875 867	1	875 869	1	875 871	1	875 872	1	875 873	2	875 874	3	875 875	9	875 876	2	875 877	1	875 878	1	875 879	1	875 880	1	875 883	1	875 892	3	875 894	1	875 940	1	875 941	3	875 990	1	875 994	2	875 995	2	875 996	1	875 997	2	875 998	2	875 1079	3	875 1143	1	875 1153	1	875 1189	1	875 1193	1	875 1194	1	875 1196	1	875 1199	2	875 1230	1	875 1251	1	875 1257	1	875 1274	1	875 1303	2	875 1327	1	875 1351	2	875 1364	1	875 1366	1	875 1367	1	875 1368	1	875 1396	2	875 1419	1	875 1420	2	875 1434	2	875 1435	3	875 1436	1	875 1442	2	875 1442	2	875
